title: begin
body:
You (Liam) always were a livid dreamer. Most of the times you had some form of control over your dreams.
One night however, you find yourself dreaming a little bit too real.
This is where your story begins

title: your story begins
body: It was a clear starry night. You find yourself wandering through the woods "How did I get here?" you say to yourself. "Oh right... probably a dream" [image: Scenes/Intro/Dreamforest01.png] You look around you and recognise the place. Just over the hill you find yourself a lake. "That's lovers lake! I've been here before." Then... suddenly, a large bang. You look up and see a small meteorite flying through the sky. [image: Scenes/Intro/Dreamforest02.png] It crashes at the other side of the lake. You're interested. At first you started walking around the lake but then you remembered it was a dream and you ran across the water towards where the rock crashed into the dirt. "Cool" you think to yourself As you arrive at the crash site you see that the ground is glowing near a crooked birch tree. You go over there and pick up the rock with your bare hands You drop it again for it is icy cold "But how? It was burning through the skies just a second ago" You take off your shirt and wrap it around the rock before picking it up again. Now the rock doesn't burn your hands. You get back home and try to sell the rock to a witch walking by. You vaguely recognise this 'witch' [image: Characters/Emily/WitchCostumePose01.png] It's Emily, she was dressed as a witch last halloween You know Emily since kindergarten. You were never really friends but somehow ended up in the same class each year. You would describe Emily as an average girl. Emily wants to buy the rock for 150.000 euros "Deal" you eagerly say. Next thing you know you're in your mansion in the backyard. You see a swimming pool and decide to jump in immediately. After you take a leap. You seem to keep falling... and falling... You're really scared now. The water just isn't getting any closer "Now wait a minute" you think to yourself "this isn't fun. I think I'm done. I want to wake up now" You try... Path $RandomNumber out of 2 And it doesn't work... you look around\ And succeed you wake up

that was such a weird dream

At the end of the day you decide to study a little more. However when you went to the bus stop you just missed the last bus home.
		
At the end of the day you find out your car has run out of gas.
		
At the end of the day you find out your bike is stolen.

"haha, thanks" the genie laughs "And come on. Make a first wish. I have been flying around for a while and I'm bored. Don't think to much of it. As I said, unlimited wishes. Oh and I'm not here to trick you or anything."

Not too long, Cosmos seems eager and to be fair... so am I

You pick the stone back up and speak to it:"Okay Cosmos, are you ready?"
"Always!" It replies. You can hear in the voice that it's smiling
"Well then, I wish..."

There is no response
"Cosmos, you there?"

"Yeah well... sort of. And eh, unlimited wishes you know so I just went for something that first came to mind"
"Hey no judgement. So eh, wich girl exactly? You dream of a variety of different girls"

title: Mark opens the door

title: A woman opens the door
body: You recognise the woman as Marcella, Mark's twin sister. [image: Characters/Marcella/Scene/MorningYawn.png] She yawns agressively. As she looks you up and down her morning crogginess seems to fade. "Liam? Is that you?" You knew Marcella a while before she went out of town to a different school. She always was the smarter twin of the two. You had a small crush on her for a while and actually used to buddy up with Mark to get closer to her. But as your friendship with Mark grew your crush on her faded. You still really like her but you see a bit too much of your best friend in her. "Oh ehm, hi Marcella. I'm sorry to disturb you so early. Is Mark in?" "Oh no worries. Eh, no. Mark is out. Not sure where he went, probably to the store to get some groceries. I kinda dropped by unexpected late last night" "Oh can I ask why?" "Yeah you can, but hurry in, it's kinda cold in the door" You step inside

title: You step inside
body:
Once inside Marcella quickly gets past you and hurries over to the sofa.
She grabs a duvet and pillow from the couch (she clearly spend the night on) and throws them into what you know to be Mark's bedroom.
"Ah, so you really just dropped in unexpected?" You break the ice
"Ehm, yeah, kinda like you right now. Want anything to drink?"
"No thanks"
She grabs a drink for herself anyways.
"Yeah, no, I just finished the semester and have a week off so I thought I'd spend at least the weekend with Mark. Allthough he didn't really like me dropping in unannounced at midnight on a friday eve"
"Midnight eh?"
"Yeah, it was quite impuslive of me. Anyways, what brings you up to Mark's humble abode?"
You doubt for a second if you should let her in to the 'secret'.
You hold the rock as you say:"I wish I knew how to tell you this"
A voice in your head responds: "Dude, I'm not gonna waste magic on this. Just tell her and see where it leads"
You swallow your pride and place the rock on the kitchen counter.
"So I found this rock..."
"Ehm... okay, cool." She stares at it for a bit "So... what about it?"
Fuck this doesn't make for a great impression after a few years of no visual contact
"You probably won't believe me, but this rock can speak to me"
"Liam..." She looks at you in amazement. "Are you sure you don't want anything? Coffee? Energy Drink?"
"No-no" you interfere "It can speak. Come on Cosmos, I wish she can hear you as well"
"Well, for one: I'm not a party trick. And secondly"
"It's awefully quiet, Liam. Kinda awkward"
"One sec, Marcella, let me think"
"Secondly, I can only speak to my master. So you can hold the rock together and I might get a word or two for you"
You do as told. You grab Marcella's hand and place the rock inside, mossy part in her palm.
At first she just spaces out but then drops the rock in slight fear.
"WHAT-THE-FUCK LIAM! This isn't some funny prank, this creeps me out"
"Trust me" You tell her "Just listen to the rock explain itself"
She reluctantly picks up the rock again.
"INFINITE WISHES!?"
You notice you can't hear Cosmos' voice and try to hold the rock simultainiously.
"Welcome back, master. I've explained everything you know about me to mistress. Unfortunately it strains me too much to talk to both of you remotely so only the last person to touch me is master of the rockade"
"Liam... This is amazing. Where to begin?!"
"Well" you respond with a smirk "Ladies first" you offer her the stone
"Oh, so you wanna do this one at a time?"
"Yeah, as long as you keep it small, no big reality altering stuff, I think this could be fun"
"Liam, you have no idea but I kinda came prepared"
"What do you mean?"

title: What do you mean?
body:
She starts to blush.
"I, ehm, fantasize about shit like this on the internet. I write short stories now and then"
"About infinite wishes? Don't tell me it's fetish stuff"
"No, no. Nothing like that. Well, everything is a fetish for someone"
"Should I worry? It's a lot for me to trust you while one could say we barely know each other"
"Oh hush, we know each other enough. Now let me think"
You worry a bit. She seems to have quite the conversation with the rock.
Her eyes darting between thoughts and you.
"Liam, I'm sorry. Cosmos convinced me this would be fine and not too weird. But I always wanted a look at myself. I wish you looked like me.
Like an exact clone."
"Oh come on" You complain.

Denser and denser. Like a fur!
And just as you think it's over a puff of hair forms between your boobs
"This feels so incredibly gross" You say as you poke the puff
"Oh my god, you're so cuuuuuuuute"
You feel another *puff* as you grow a tail. Pulling your panties uncomfortable up between your buttocks
"Didn't we promise no fetishes?"
"Well, it's not one of mine." Marcella awnsers as she can't let go of your small tail. "Besides, I promised no such thing"
"Great. Now when you're done, hand me the stone so I can return back to normal"
"Awww...." She looks you up and down. "No"
"No? What do you mean 'No'?"
"Well, I only hand you the stone if you promise not to undo anything untill we're done playing"
"I promise we're not done playing but I really feel exposed in someone elses body, especially if it's owner is standing in front of me"
"Hmm, I guess I get what you mean. Sorry I got too into it. Here"
She hands you the rock. You reach but she holds it.
"But it will cost you your turn" She sais as she lets go.
Finally back in control you wish:
"I'm going to phrase it really clear:
I wish I looked like I did yesterday"
